Name: ds000248
Acknowledgements: Alexandre Gramfort, Mainak Jas, and Stefan Appelhoff prepared and updated the data in BIDS format.
HowToAcknowledge: If you reference this dataset in your publications, please acknowledge its authors and cite MNE. Also, please include the following message: 'This data was obtained from the OpenNeuro database. Its accession number is ds000248'
